name: INSearchForBillsIntent
desc: A request for the list of bills matching the specified criteria.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.

items.name: init(billPayee: INBillPayee?, paymentDateRange: INDateComponentsRange?, billType: INBillType, status: INPaymentStatus, dueDateRange: INDateComponentsRange?)
items.desc: Initializes an intent object that describes a search for bill details with the specified search parameters.

items.name: var dueDateRange: INDateComponentsRange?
items.desc: The range of due dates in which to search for bills.

items.name: var paymentDateRange: INDateComponentsRange?
items.desc: The range of payment dates in which to search for bills.
